content.rendered:
Donation Center

Thank you for visiting the donation center of GEOKC, a very right spot to fulfill our Mission and Goal via serving GEOKC as devotee Seva. This center is central attraction of all types of donations, related with Way to Give (both for restricted and unrestricted funds) including all different kinds of campaigns and very secure to donate. Anyone welcome to donate from Donation Center by selecting any type of donation of Way to Give to use the donated amount into the same area for greatest effect. To do so please click on the link below:

Ways to Give

Donation Center is a place for both in person donation or Seva and also through the website of GEOKC to provide the information about Way to give to all donors to help them to donate in a secure manner which support the Mission and Goal of GEOKC permanently.

GEOKC is a 501(c)(3) charitable non-profit organization, under the regulations of the Internal Revenue Service. All contributions to this organization are tax-deductible to the extent provided by law
